import React from 'react' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button'; function HomeFeatures({carouselData}) { return (
  • Budget-friendly options for every customer
  • Guaranteed 100% delivery success rate
  • Wide variety of cuisines to satisfy diverse tastes
  • Efficient and timely delivery services
  • User-friendly mobile app for seamless ordering
{carouselData.map((item) => ( {' '} {item.verified && ( {item.kitchenName} )}
Delivery time: {item.deliveryRate} {`${item?.km}km`} away
))} ) } export default HomeFeatures
